Trying its best to redefine what bad game design is, Dead by Daylight is a horror game that scares the community with its innovative ways of breaking itself. Besides a paid DLC every 3-4 months, there's no "it has come a long way" with this game. Something always breaks, every update, and if somethings gets fixed, that's because it's giving room for something else to break. Balance is a joke, game is designed in a way that rewards toxic behaviour and frustration is the norm on most of your matches if you're a solo survivor or killer.  Only buy this game if you really, absolutely enjoy the (decently well built) horror lore and fanservice this game has.

Game is great in a current state. Lots of perks and characters - interesting to learn and investigate for the first 100 hours.
First Tried it in 2016 game was a lackluster for content. 
Graphics and animations much improved since.

After you've learned the game well enough to play "competitively" - you start to notice imperfections.. 
Such as crazy matchmaking system which will mix everyone up. Easily could be Rank 20 with 5 hours of playtime playing against Rank 1. 

Still highly recommend every horror movie lover to try.

Great multiplayer experience (for the first 500 hours, at least).  

Surprisingly lots of girls playing. 

Overall: 8.75/10

Игра полный мусор.
1. У маньяка преимущество во всём.
2. Будь у тебя даже 20 ранг тебе попадаются 1 и за маньяка и за выживших.
3. Способности некоторых маньяков это полный пиздец, они не дают не единого шанса на победу.
4. Пока ты не начнёшь дрочить в эту игру 24/7 ты будешь сливать, или пока не затимишься с маньяком.
5. Улучшения на маньяка дают тоже большое преимущество, за сурва ты получаешь сраные инструменты или аптечку которая в принципе почти ничего не даёт.
Играя в эту игру только просрёте свои нервы.

Игра не новая, но приобрёл сейчас. Всё нравится, рекомендую к покупке.

Коротко, вся суть игры:
Фейскемпишь и туннелишь -rep.
Нормально играешь на маньяке -rep.
Ты без перков и адоннов попался против пати задротов, ну какой же ты слабый ман, удали игру и -rep.
Не снял с крюка против кемпера, ты даун -rep.
Снял с крюка выжившего, но ман потом догнал его и повесил обратно, найс фармишь меня -rep.
Если ты русский, то однозначно -rep.
Не отпустил сурва - токсик, а если отпустил - то ты бот.
Лучшая игра короче! <3

O jogo é muito bom mas o Matchmaking deixa a desejar, constantemente você se encontra sendo pareado com pessoas com o Rank totalmente diferente do seu. Em certas partidas você cai com pessoas que parecem ter apenas 2 dígitos de QI e em outras você tem a sensação de estar jogando com jogadores profissionais. Tirando isso, podem comprar sem medo!

Great game with healthy playerbase. Finally something new (for me at least) , was bored of all the shooting and killing (survivor main here) so this game is super refreshing to me. As survivor main i find some of the killers kind of op, but still its quite even :) Maps are great, every map has its own atmosphere, from cornfields and farms, to swamp like surroundings, and even laboratory and much more. Also the perk selection is just amazing , the selection of survivors and killers is alway expanding (and the perks too ) , not sure how frequently but still, game that has so many players on steam after some time that its out (also has crossplay) must be something special, and it is. I love it!
